title: Subchapter C - General Awards, Academic Performance Awards, Fellowships and Other Awards
content:
Subchapter C - General Awards, Academic Performance Awards, Fellowships and Other Awards

State Regulations

Part 2200 - General Purposes And Definitions (§ 2200.1 to 2200.2)

Part 2201 - General Eligibility Criteria (§ 2201.1 to 2201.23)

Part 2202 - Tuition Assistance Program Awards (§ 2202.1 to 2202.7)

Part 2203 - Academic Performance Awards And Fellowships (§ 2203.1 to 2203.9)

Part 2204 - Duration Of Eligibility (§ 2204.1 to 2204.3)

Part 2205 - Applicant And Institutional Responsibilities (§ 2205.1 to 2205.4)

Part 2206 - Payment Of Awards (§ 2206.1 to 2206.3)

Part 2207 - Awards For Part-time Students (§ 2207.1 to 2207.3)

Part 2208 - Regents Physician Loan Forgiveness Program (§ 2208.1 to 2208.4)

Part 2209 - Repealed

Part 2212 - New York State Health Service Corps Scholarship And Fellowship Program (§ 2212.1 to 2212.5)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
